title: 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment - West Philly - $1275 per month
description:
New Construction! - 1 bed/1 bath apartment!
Welcome to this lovely, new construction apartment which sits on an extremely wide & quiet block in the heart of West Philadelphia. This light filled 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment unit has everything you could ask for!
Enter into the bright and airy kitchen featuring Samsung energy efficient stainless steel appliances, a gas range, a dishwasher and a quartz countertop. The kitchen conveniently overlooks the living room complete with, luxury flooring, recessed lighting, and a large bay window allowing tons of natural light to pour in. Past the kitchen you will find the bathroom featuring custom tile and a reclaimed wood vanity. Towards the back of the floor you will be greeted by a large bedroom with ample closet space.
The unit includes a High Efficiency Washer and Dryer located in its own laundry closet as well as brand new central air and water heater along with all new mechanicals. The front of the house also has a nice shared deck with room for trash below the deck
This property is optimally nested in the heart of West Philadelphia and is only a short walk away from Malcolm X Park, Aldi, Vidas Athletic Park and Penn and Drexel Universities to name a few venues. Pets are accepted and subject to landlord interview and approval. Veterinary records must be provided showing the pet is up to date on all vaccines and spayed or neutered. There is a $200 non-refundable pet deposit per pet, and a $20 per month pet rent for the first pet, with an additional $10 for each additional pet.
Early Payment Discount Voucher Program: As an inducement to the Tenant(s) to pay rent on time, if rent is paid before the due date of the month, and set up as an auto payment, the Tenant(s) may deduct as a discount the amount of $100 (US Dollars) from the Rent. In addition, said discount shall be forfeited by Tenant(s) if they are in breach of any of the lease clauses contained herein; included but not limited to any charges or funds due and owing to Landlord.
First month's rent of $1100 and a refundable security deposit of $1000 are due at lease signing, totaling $2100 due at signing.

title: Renovated 1 BR Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Lounge, Bike Storage
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, or The Continental Mid-town. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Di Bruno Bros., or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Buy a babka, brookie, sticky bun, scone, or muffin from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Bike storage
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.

* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor

title: 2br - Large Two Bedroom Townhouse In Olde Kensington $1200mo
description:
Large two bedroom townhouse in Olde Kensington. Still has the original central stair case. Hard to find in the original configuration. New paint throughout. Large living room and dining room with beautiful original hardwood floors. Brand new wall to wall carpet in the bedrooms upstairs. Nice kitchen in the rear with refrigerator and full size stove. On the second floor, the bedrooms are nice sized with closets and a full bath. There is a laundry in the basement with washer and dryer. Plenty of storage in the basement. Small cement patio in back of the house for summer BBQ's and relaxing. Easy commute to Temple University or Center City. Great location close to schools, shopping at the Piazza, Girard, Frankford Ave shopping, restaurants and nightlife. Plenty of public transportation. Minutes to I-95 and Septa Regional rail. Easy walk to the Berks St Train Station (The El). Rent is $1200 per month. Cat is OK. Requirements: Good credit, rental history and employment. Security deposit required to move-in. No application fee. Call Joe at  show contact info
for appointment. No emails. No calls after 7PM. If you are interested call or text the phone number. Thank you.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Sauna, Package Lockers, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and South Philadelphia. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home will have wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 1, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, The Love, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab a babka or sticky bun from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or the current exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Building on Rittenhouse Square
* Sauna
* Package lockers
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 25th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* Chancellor Street/South Philadelphia view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2512 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! title: Dog Friendly Renovated Town House with New Kitchen and Yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Cat friendly Apartment with New Kitchen, Tons of Natural Light
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: well-appointed and well-kept home.
description: Nestled on a quiet street in the charming town of Mohnton, set back from the road up on a slight hill lies this charming, well-appointed and well-kept home. A pleasant mix of tile (kitchen and bath) and carpet (living room and bedroom) compliments beautiful window treatments, dark wood cabinets, newer counter tops and backsplash, and welcoming light-colored paint throughout the house. Outside, there are multiple places to enjoy coffee, conversation or a home cooked dinner: The front porch, set back far from the road with a view of the hillside in the distance. The back courtyard, accessible through the back door and perfectly situated at the bottom of a foliage lined hill. Or the garden platform, in the middle of the yard at the foot of a large shade tree and next to the garden. And last but not least, the fire pit up on the shed porch. The two-room basement provides for plenty of storage. Last but not least is the "shed". This outdoor structure has been converted into a climate-controlled livable space and could be a pad, guesthouse, getaway, pet pad, kid's fort, extra storage or anything your imagination can create.

title: Spacious, Ranch Home on Private Estate Property
description:
Spectacular setting. Spacious, authentic Mid-Century Modern Ranch home with attached 2 car garage beautifully situated on a 50-acre forested estate bordered by the Perkiomen Trail and Creek. Private lane leads to circular drive and hilltop location. Two bedrooms. Master bedroom with 2 built-in dressers, 2 large closets. Two full bathrooms. Tremendous great room with large stone fireplace. Lots of storage space. Tranquil and private location, yet close to shopping (3 miles) and urban centers (about 1 hour to Philadelphia or Allentown.) Exceptionally large patio graced by pines and hemlocks. Large kitchen. Dry Basement. Large fenced garden plot. Rent includes water and septic. Wired for Fios. Connected by walking trail to 3,600 acre Green Lane Park and Knight Lake. 3 miles to Spring Mount Ski and Mountain Bike Area. Private access to Perkiomen Trail and Creek. Ideal location to bike, jog, hike, walk, boat or fish. Dog(s) negotiable. No cats. No smoking! Souderton School District. 2 miles from Salford Hills Elementary School. Easy access to Routes 29 and 63. Quoted rent for 1-year lease. Inquire for furnished rate.

title: Delightful Home above Perkiomen Creek
description:
Right, Cheerful 3 bedroom completely renovated cottage home on large (55-acre) estate property. Tranquil and private location. Kitchen and great room on 2nd floor.
Home is "upside-down" to take advantage of amazing views of the creek. Upper floor with vaulted ceiling. Kitchen, great room, 1/2 bath and "bonus' room on upper level. Three bedrooms, living room and amazing, huge, bright enclosed and heated insulated sun porch on 1st floor as well as full, ceramic tile bathroom (tub and shower) and laundry room downstairs.
Utility/storage room at back section of cottage. The cottage also has a basement.
Wood floors on 1st level are refinished old pine; 2nd level is brand new Brazilian cherry hardwood. Stone patio and garden in front. This home is located on a 55-acre estate bordering the Perkiomen Trail and Creek with access to Perkiomen Trail and Creek from the property. New or newer
appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, microwave, washer and dryer. Amazing house; Spectacular location.

title: Ardmore (Haverford Twp) 3 Bedroom 1 Bath
description:
3-Bedroom, 1-Bathroom house with central air conditioning. Cooking, heat and hot water are gas. There's a full unfinished basement available for appropriate storage. The driveway accommodates 2 cars, and there is usually ample street parking on Clifford Ave as well. Outdoor space includes both front and back yards. A working washer and dryer are available for free use by the tenants, however if tenants use them the tenants are responsible for the ongoing service and maintenance.
Location:
The house is about a 5 minute walk to the south/east side of Haverford College's campus (very close to the entrance to the nature trail). Short walk to shopping and dining in the Ardmore Historic District, Suburban Square, SEPTA regional rail and the Route 100 High Speed Line. Closest SEPTA bus stop is County Line and Cricket (Route 103).
The address and school district is Haverford Township, and the elementary school is Chestnutwold.
Terms and Timing:
The rent will be $2,300 per month including lawn care. Tenants are responsible for all utilities (water, electricity, gas, cable/internet) and must maintain a basic renter's insurance policy of their choosing. The first year lease will be October or November 2022 through May 2024 (20 months), and then one-year renewals thereafter.
Up to two cats OR one small dog under 25lbs and 10" tall (adult weight and height) with current vaccines are permitted for an additional $100 per month. No cigarette or cigar smoking is permitted inside.
Before new tenants move in we're refreshing the space with new carpet and paint. Those renovations are expected to be complete and the property is expected to be available by early October.
Tenant Qualifications:

title: Succulent 3BR for rent
description: This awesome Kirklyn twin has ALL THE I WANT'S! Tucked away on a side street yet close to all the main attractions, you'll spot this one, just because of it's amazing curb appeal. The roofed, open front porch, with vinyl fencing, is the perfect spot to relax at the end of the day and check out the happenings on this tree-lined street. As you step into this home, you'll be excited about the up to date colors and the great open floor plan. The living room features a gas fire place trimmed in a ceramic tile surround, and coffee colored walls. The dining room and kitchen are open to each other, separated by a granite peninsula. In the dining space you'll find a CF, 2 high slider windows on the side wall, a sliding doors that take you to the wide and deep deck, with 2 sets of steps, which overlooks the fabulous fenced yard. The IKEA kitchen will be a delight for cooks and non-cooks alike. The cabinetry is state of the art, some of which have a frosted glass insert. Granite countertops and a glass-tiled backsplash really set the tonne! Other amenities here include bamboo-like, interlocking floor boards, a recipe book shelf, a GE microwave and DW, recessed and pendant lights, a stainless sink, White fridge (not pictured), stove, and dish washer. The steps to the 2nd floor originate from the LR. Three good-sized bedrooms can be found here, as well as a hall bath. The MBR has tropical copper/orange walls, Berber wall to wall, a new CF, a TV recessed into the wall, new vinyl blinds and a closet BR #2 boasts a high chair rail, wainscoting and a double closet. The 3rd BR, comes equipped w/ double closet, grey w/ w and CF. The hall bath shows off a vanity sink w/ waterfall faucet, glass shelves. The basement is full & unfinished. There is a steel door that goes to the outside. The 100 amp electric service was upgraded in 2010.The gas Crown boiler heater was installed in '09.There are radiators and cast iron baseboards t/o. Other features of this lovely place include 6 panel doors, new siding('09), painted stucco, a concrete pad for the trash cans, and a storage shed. Walk to the bus on WC Pike or the Norristown line in nearby Highland Park. Township Line offers easy access to the Blue Route and Center City. A golf course is just across Lynn Boulevard. There are lots of eateries all up and down West Chester Pike, including the famous Pica's.
